short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle webpage text between Latin and Russian alphabets with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alphabet Converter is a fun and interactive Chrome extension designed to help you learn the Russian alphabet. With a single click on the extension icon, it transforms all text on any webpage between the Latin and Russian alphabets, preserving the original structure and formatting. Perfect for language enthusiasts, students, or anyone curious about the Cyrillic script, this tool makes exploring and learning the Russian alphabet easy and engaging. It even respects uppercase and lowercase letters for a natural reading experience.
